## ThirdwebSDK.resolveModuleType() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resolveModuleType<TModuleType extends ModuleType>(moduleAddress: string): Promise<TModuleType>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  moduleAddress | string | the address of the module to attempt to resolve the module type for |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TModuleType&gt;

the [ModuleType](./sdk.moduletype.md) for the given module address

## Exceptions

if the module type cannot be determined (is not a valid thirdweb module)
